author: dwinterfeldt
msg: Passing in the application context to the validation methods is no longer necessary because the MessageResources are now in request scope to handle multiple applications.

author: dwinterfeldt
msg: Rules now explicitly state the method signiture they use to correspond to changes in the Commons Validator.

author: dwinterfeldt
msg: Added a ValidatorPlugin to use the new plugin interface.  So ValidatorServlet is no longer necessary and ValidatorResources can be loaded by defining the plugin in struts-config.xml.

author: dwinterfeldt
msg: Moved Validator initialization so ValidatorForm and DynaActionForm can share the method.

author: craigmcc
msg: Port fix for Bugzilla #6098 (null values for <bean:define>) to 1.0 branch.
Submitted by:	Bill Wallace <wayfarer3134 at yahoo.com>
